mapper.select: SELECT t1.id, t1.dict_type_id, t1.dict_label, t1.dict_value, t1.css_class, t1.list_class, t1.is_default, t1.create_admin_id, t1.update_admin_id, t1.remark, t1.create_time, t1.update_time, t1.sort FROM t_sys_dict_data t1 LEFT JOIN t_sys_dict_type t2 ON t1.dict_type_id=t2.id WHERE t2.is_deleted = 0 AND t2.dict_type=#{dictType}
